title: "Alarm & timer notifications are off" but no option to turn them back on?
content:
I've been using the alarm from the built-in clock app, but it hasn't been working. I have tried setting a few, and sometimes none of them go off. Sometimes, the first alarm will go off, but it won't repeat if I've snoozed it (no matter how much I fuss with the snooze settings). And NEVER have ALL of the alarms gone off (I usually set 2-3). 

Every time I open the app, a notification at the bottom pops up that says "Alarm & timer notifications are set to off" with a link to the settings page. But when I get to the settings page, every option to turn them back on is greyed out! I can't figure out what setting has made it impossible for me to turn these back on (under "Firing alarms & timers"). Under "App Info" for the clock app, Notifications are turned on. Under the clock app "Settings" I have "Show Notifications" turned on, and every option checked on. What gives?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
